name: Gravity Run (itch) (Floky)
description:
Made this game in 3 Days for a Game Jam (SpaceScoreJam), I love this tiny game. I played it for countless hours.

The Goal is simple, you try to stay alive as long as possible by dodging the Pointy boiz and the Lazer Dudes by switching the gravity while listening to a chill song.

The controls are simple: WASD or Arrow keys to switch the gravity.

Not sure if I'll continue working on it even if I have quite a few cool ideas for it... I guess it depends on the feedback I get!

The game is surprisingly relaxing, give it a try ;)

Check out my youtube, I'll be posting a Devlog about the game very soon ;)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw90yhJXRhN6W5ahGJtFQLQ
